options.content: TABLERO DE ABASTECIMIENTO LOGISTICO

UNIDAD ORGANIZATIVA

TM-SMG

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
'Línea' AS Línea, 	
'Fabricante' AS Fabricante,	
'Color'	AS Color,
'Modelo' AS Modelo,
'Orden'	AS Orden,
'Estado' AS Estado,
'Cantidad inicio' AS Cantidad_inicio,	
'Ingreso a línea'	AS Ingreso_a_línea,
'Saldo a ingresar' AS Saldo_a_ingresar,
'Producidos'	AS Producidos,
'Saldo a producir' AS Saldo_a_producir

options.content: TM06

result.text: No existe orden cerrada o suspendida para la línea.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    linea, 
    fabricante AS fabricante, 
    color, 
    modelo, 
    orden, 
    cant_inicio, 
    ingreso_a_linea, 
    saldo_a_ingresar, 
    producidos, 
    saldo_a_prod, 
    estado,
    timestamp_act AS fecha,
    timestamp_act AS hora
FROM "industrial"."sim_abastecimiento_logistico_tdf"
WHERE linea IN ('TM06','TM07','TM08','TM09','TM10');

result.text: No existe orden activada para la línea.
No existe orden lanzada para la línea.

query.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    cod_lprod_19m
FROM oee_dashboard.oee_v_indicadores_calc
WHERE origen = 'CNT'
AND cod_planta_pp18 = 'ONTEC'
AND cod_uorg_pp10 = 'UNAONTEC'
AND cod_lprod_19m in ('EAPINY01','EAPINY02','EAPINY03','EAPPIN01');
